meanings.sent1: The overdear necklace was too expensive for me to buy.
meanings.sent2: The boutique sold overdear dresses that were out of my budget.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called the ordinary pencil an overdear writing tool.
meanings.sent4: The overdear concert tickets felt like they cost a fortune.
meanings.sent5: The overdear painting was beyond what I could afford.

meanings.definition: To hold in too great esteem; to love excessively.
meanings.sent1: He overdears his vintage car and spends hours polishing it.
meanings.sent2: She overdears her pet cat and showers it with affection.
meanings.sent3: The little girl overdears her teddy bear and takes it everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The artist overdears his masterpiece and is hesitant to sell it.
meanings.sent5: The mother overdears her children and always puts their needs first.
